GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.4.189
GSD.description:
ASoC: SOF: Intel: Fix NULL ptr dereference when ENOMEM

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 01df5f7627f1624d6bb0b8c0870a569b32adfbf8, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit d16046ffa6de040bf580a64d5f4d0aa18258a854. For more details please see the references link.
